actions.query: SELECT [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[PayPal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [PayPal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[PayPal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [PayPal2Payments].[Description] as Description     FROM [Europay].[dbo].[PayPal2Payments],  [PaymentStateDefs] where [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [PayPal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[PayPal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [PayPal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[PayPal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [PayPal2Payments].[Description] as Description     FROM [Europay].[dbo].[PayPal2Payments],  [PaymentStateDefs] where [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [PayPal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT [paypal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[paypal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[paypal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [paypal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[paypal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[paypal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[paypal2Payments].[CapturedAmount] as CapturedAmount    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[paypal2Payments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [paypal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and paypal2Payments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [paypal2Payments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[PayPal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [PayPal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[PayPal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency, [PayPal2Payments].[CapturedAmount] as CapturedAmount  , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [PayPal2Payments].[Description] as Description     FROM [Europay].[dbo].[PayPal2Payments],  [PaymentStateDefs] where [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [PayPal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT [paypal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[paypal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[paypal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [paypal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[paypal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[paypal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[paypal2Payments].[CapturedAmount] as CapturedAmount    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[paypal2Payments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [paypal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and paypal2Payments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [paypal2Payments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[PayPal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [PayPal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[PayPal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [PayPal2Payments].[Description] as Description     FROM [Europay].[dbo].[PayPal2Payments],  [PaymentStateDefs] where [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [PayPal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT [paypal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[paypal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,[paypal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [paypal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID ,[paypal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[paypal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status ,[paypal2Payments].[CapturedAmount] as CapturedAmount    FROM [Europay].[dbo].[paypal2Payments] with (NOLOCK), [PaymentStateDefs] where [paypal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and paypal2Payments.GPaymentID =@TRXID and  [paypal2Payments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[PayPal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [PayPal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[PayPal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [PayPal2Payments].[Description] as Description     FROM [Europay].[dbo].[PayPal2Payments],  [PaymentStateDefs] where [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [PayPal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT [Paypal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID, [Paypal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID, [Paypal2Payments].[ActionTypeID] as ActionTypeID, [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID, [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID, [Paypal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount, [Paypal2Payments].[AvailableAmount] as AvailableAmount, [Paypal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency, [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status, [Paypal2Payments].[ProviderErrorCode] as ProviderErrorCode  FROM [Europay].[dbo].[Paypal2Payments], [PaymentStateDefs] where [Paypal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID] and [Paypal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID
select AvailableAmount, ActionTypeID from Paypal2Payments where GPaymentID= (select InitialTransactionID from Paypal2Payments where GPaymentID=@TRXID and MerchantID=@MID)

SELECT [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[PayPal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [PayPal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[PayPal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [PayPal2Payments].[Description] as Description     FROM [Europay].[dbo].[PayPal2Payments],  [PaymentStateDefs] where [PayPal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [PayPal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [PayPal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT [Paypal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID, [Paypal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID, [Paypal2Payments].[ActionTypeID] as ActionTypeID, [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID, [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID, [Paypal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount, [Paypal2Payments].[AvailableAmount] as AvailableAmount, [Paypal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency, [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status, [Paypal2Payments].[ProviderErrorCode] as ProviderErrorCode  FROM [Europay].[dbo].[Paypal2Payments], [PaymentStateDefs] where [Paypal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID] and [Paypal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID
select AvailableAmount, ActionTypeID from Paypal2Payments where GPaymentID= (select InitialTransactionID from Paypal2Payments where GPaymentID=@TRXID and MerchantID=@MID)

SELECT ID, MerchantID, PaymentTypeID, InputDateTime, Description, PreapprovalStateDefID, NotificationDateTime, SubID, LastNotifiedPreapprovalStateDefID FROM PreapprovalRequests WHERE ID = @PREAPPROVALID

actions.body: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><Request version="1.0" xmlns="http://europay.smart2pay.com/message"><Action>INSERT_PREAPPROVED_PAYIN</Action><MID>$MID</MID><MSID>1016</MSID><PaymentMethod>paypal2</PaymentMethod><IPAddress>127.0.0.1</IPAddress><Hash>$HASH</Hash><Details><MTID>$MTID</MTID><Amount>100</Amount><Currency>EUR</Currency><PreapprovalID>$PREAPPROVALID</PreapprovalID><Description>VS EP Automated Test Payment</Description></Details></Request>

actions.query: SELECT [Paypal2Payments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[Paypal2Payments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID , [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [Paypal2Payments].[Amount] as Amount ,[Paypal2Payments].[Currency] as Currency , [PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [Paypal2Payments].[Description] as Description  , [Paypal2Payments].[PreapprovalID] as PreapprovalID   FROM [Europay].[dbo].[Paypal2Payments], [PaymentStateDefs] where [Paypal2Payments].[PaymentStateDefID] = [PaymentStateDefs].[PaymentStateDefID]   and [Paypal2Payments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [Paypal2Payments].[MerchantID]= @MID

SELECT ID, MerchantID, PaymentTypeID, InputDateTime, Description, PreapprovalStateDefID, NotificationDateTime, SubID, LastNotifiedPreapprovalStateDefID FROM PreapprovalRequests WHERE ID = @PREAPPROVALID

SELECT PR.MerchantID, PR.PaymentTypeID AS MethodID, PR.PreapprovalStateDefID, PSD.Name AS Status FROM PreapprovalRequests AS PR LEFT OUTER JOIN PreapprovalStateDefs AS PSD ON PR.PreapprovalStateDefID = PSD.ID WHERE PR.ID = @PREAPPROVALID
